1.value: A young Discord user stares at their server. It just so happens that today, the 5th of October, 2021, is this young person's birthday. Though it was sixteen years ago they were given life, it is only today that they will be given a nickname!
What will the nickname of this young person be?

2.value:
Anyway, your nickname is LOCKYâ˜…P, but your real name is DEAXS. You enjoy playing VIDEO GAMES such as SUPER MARIO BROS and SONIC THE HEDGEHOG on your NINTENDO SWITCH. Sometimes, you like playing games with your buddies on your LENOVO SHITBOX PC. Occasionally, you see spiders crawl out of said PC.

You sleep with the LAMP on because you're scared of the dark. You got a WELCOME MAT on your last birthday. You think it's stupid, as it is facing THE WRONG FUCKING WAY. You only buy calendars just so you can circle October 5th, then you throw them away. Well, it is your BIRTHDAY. Why not find something fun to do?

What will you do?

3.value:
>Put lamp shade on head

You are now looking through two shades instead of one. You would look in a mirror to see if this makes you look any cooler, but you can't see shit. You also do not have any mirrors in this room. Maybe you could ask for one for your next birthday.
You are not sure if this will even be useful, but you decide to put the lamp shade into your INVENTORY anyway. It should look familiar, so it needs no explanation.
Now that you've discovered your INVENTORY, is there anything else that you would like to put in there?

4.value:
>Put the rest of the lamp in your INVENTORY.

Well, can't take the shade without the lamp, can you? What else will you use to light up the dark if you need to sleep somewhere else? Although now that you've separated the shade from the lamp itself, you'll need to somehow put them back together.

>Craft regular lamp.

Using your crafting grid in your undisclosed reference of an inventory, you fuse together the lamp shade and the lamp body to craft a perfect regular lamp. Or you would have, if you didn't put the lamp shade on upside down. Oh well, now you just have a large and inconvenient flashlight. You put the INCONVENIENT FLASHLIGHT in your inventory.

In any case, you are getting bored and would like to do something on your LENOVO SHITBOX PC. Maybe you could talk to your buddies or play a game.

You've had this piece of shit for a while now, and it is starting to piss you off. It used to be alright, but now it runs slower than something that doesn't even have legs. It is more useful as a housing unit for spiders than a computer at this point.

It is taking an unusually long amount of time to turn on. What will you do?

5.value:
>Plead with the spiders.

Spiders cannot understand English. Your pleading means nothing. The PC is still not turning on.

Obviously they wouldn't be able to understand you, and you are not sure why you tried that. You decide to try using sign language instead. Somehow, the spiders seem to understand sign language.

You sign to them, "turn the fucking computer on," and they sign back saying it's going to take about 5 minutes until this piece of trash is fully operational again.

It seems like you will need to occupy yourself with something else while the spiders are hard at work. You are not exactly sure what they are doing to make the computer turn on, but you trust them because they live inside of it.

In the meantime, you could EXAMINE something else in your room. What will you examine?

6.value: You can't seem to decide whether you want to examine the posters or the calendar! This is quite the predicament. This can only be solved one way...

>Flip coin.

It looks like the coin landed on tails, which means you are going to examine the calendar. (And you GUESS you'll examine the welcome mat too, since you had also considered that as an option.)

>Examine calendar.

As mentioned previously, you don't find the calendar to be particularly useful. You circle today and you get rid of it. While you could circle other days, you just don't see a reason to. Perhaps you will forgo the use of the calendar all together.

Now how about you examine the WELCOME MAT?

>Examine welcome mat.

You check under the welcome mat. What's that? There's a KEY under the welcome mat? Oh yes, but it's not just any key. It's a PIANO KEY. You don't know how this will be of any use whatsoever, but you decide to stash it away in your inventory anyway.

Ok that didn't take quite as long as you were hoping for. It seems you'll just have to wait a bit longer for the spiders to fix whatever issue your shitty PC is having.

You wonder if the spiders will want something in return for their work. Like, do they want to be paid? What currency would the spiders want? Ok stop fucking thinking about this it's probably making you dumber.

7.value: Finally the spiders are finished fixing your soon-to-be-replaced LENOVO SHITBOX PC. Looks like they aren't asking for anything in return, meaning your daydreams about spider money were completely pointless. Alright, let's see if this thing is actually functional.

Now you get to see your beautiful desktop again! It may not be the most organized desktop ever, but you know where everything is and that's good enough. 

It looks like one of your buddies is trying to contact you on discord. Now open the goddamn app!!!

[isabelfruit|#D33682] began chatting with [LOCKYâ˜…P|#DC322F]

[isabelfruit: HAPPY BIRTHDAY DUDE :D|#D33682]

[isabelfruit: what're you doing for your big day|#D33682]

[LOCKYâ˜…P: nothing lol|#DC322F]

[LOCKYâ˜…P: just spent like an hour waiting for my shitbox to turn on|#DC322F]

[isabelfruit: you shouldve just asked for a new pc for your birthday silly|#D33682]

[LOCKYâ˜…P: yeah but im stubborn as long as this thing turns on im going to use it|#DC322F]

[isabelfruit: fair fair|#D33682]

[isabelfruit: well hey while we're talking|#D33682]

[isabelfruit: did you check your porch?|#D33682]

[isabelfruit: i left a pipebo|#D33682]

[isabelfruit: PACKAGE i mean package :]|#D33682]

[isabelfruit: its got a neat gift in there for you|#D33682]

[isabelfruit: you should open it in a crowded area itll be awesome|#D33682]

[LOCKYâ˜…P: you dont need to convince me its a pipebomb i already believe you LOL|#DC322F]

[LOCKYâ˜…P: anyway thanks for the gift in advance :)|#DC322F]

You go to your door to leave your room and grab your newly delivered pipebomb present, but the door won't budge. It seems there is something big and heavy blocking it on the other side. You think it's the package your friend sent you. This means somebody must have moved it from outside to in front of your door. While that seems very considerate of them, you can't leave your damn room now.

Your intuition tells you to escape through the window. Unfortunately, you don't have one of those! Wow, this room really has fucking nothing in it. Maybe if you weren't a silly nerd you could have built a window with your bare hands. That sounds too hard actually never mind.

How will you escape your room?

8.value:
>Use your LOCKY POWERS to punch a LOCKY HOLE in the wall

You decide you like this idea most, as it seems the least fraudulent. 

Ok now what the hell are LOCKY POWERS. You don't even know what that means, but you think it sounds really funny. Now, let's see what you've got.

WOW. You can't believe that actually worked. The fuck are these walls made out of? That was WAY cooler than turning into a piece of paper.

You hope nobody gets mad at you for punching a giant LOCKY HOLE in the LOCKY WALL. I mean, they can't really get that mad at you. You know, with it being your birthday and all.

You really just jumped out the newly formed window with no regard for your own safety. Unbelievable. Anyway, it's kind of a muddy day out, isn't it? That shouldn't be a problem, considering you were about to head back inside.

Wait...
What the hell is that stupid looking block of text in the sky?
WHAT IN THE FUCK IS THAT?????

9.value:
You are just going to choose to ignore that thing.

You made it to the front door. It is always unlocked, so you will definitely be able to enter through here. This is also where the package was supposed to be, meaning the object blocking your door is 100% the gift.

Once you do through the door, you will enter the MUD ROOM.

>Enter the MUD ROOM.

Look at that, the windows on the outside are not visible from the inside. What the hell. More importantly, there is a BACKPACK in here. Maybe you should put it on. It could be very useful.

>Equip the BACKPACK.

See? You knew putting on the backpack was a good idea. It has expanded your inventory by adding nine more slots. You are now able to store twice as many items in your inventory. Unsurprisingly, the INCONVENIENT FLASHLIGHT and the PIANO KEY are still in your inventory.

After wearing the backpack for five seconds, it disappeared. It's a feature, all good backpacks today have it. 

You will now enter the KITCHEN.

>Enter the KITCHEN

There are so many different things you could inventorize within this oddly familiar kitchen. What will you add to your inventory?

10.value: Apparently, this LUNCHBOX is the closest thing resembling food in the entire damn kitchen. But theoretically, if there was a COUGHING BABY you wouldn't eat it. You don't eat babies, especially if they are sick.

>Put LUNCHBOX into your inventory.

You wonder how long it will take to fill your entire inventory full of useless objects. You aren't even sure if it will ever get that full. You are also choosing to ignore the weird logo on this lunchbox.
You decide to get to your room as quickly as possible, as to not make your friend wait. Also nice picture wow.

Whoa, that is one big pipe bomb. This time it will surely kill you. Anyway, let's open this bitch. Also nice face wow.

How will you open it?

11.value:
>Just open it fucking normally dumbass.

You decide to "just open it fucking normally dumbass", whatever that means. It's not like you wanted to do any other silly option anyway.

You are so surprised by what you see in the box! Just kidding, you have no idea what the hell you are looking at.

Although whatever it is, it seems to be related the the game called "RSIDNT" that just was also included in the box. You were going to mark this on your calendar too, since all your buddies have been discussing its much anticipated release. But to be truthful, you never thought it looked all that interesting. You add the game to your inventory.
Now THIS THING is what you don't understand. It just looks like a giant slab of metal. You will have to ask your buddy what it is supposed to do after you get it into your room.

>Move THIS THING into your room.

THIS THING is really heavy. Anyway, why are you standing on it? Get off of it, it could be radioactive or something! 

Look at that! Your buddy is messaging you.

You press a button on the back of the metal slab and a new button pops out. What is the point of this? Why not just make the first button do whatever this button does? Actually, what does this button do?

You already know what this button does because it gets explained the the RSIDNT trailer! This button will allow one of your friends to control your version of the game. You cannot press it yet because you haven't even chose a friend to play with yet.

Which friend will you contact first?

But before you can finish your thought, you become THE OTHER OTHER PERSON.
Oh great, your buddies just stopped chatting in the group chat for some fucking reason. Now who are you supposed to play the game with?
Before you find someone to play with, let's figure out who you are.

Your name is PENNY and your username is EarthDoggo. You have many interests, such as watching movies, playing games, and having piles of LEGO around your room. Your gaming setup includes a SHITTY LENOVO LAPTOP and a chair that is slanted at an uncomfortable degree.

OK yeah yeah what a loser. Can we go back to deaxs or maybe THE OTHER OTHER OTHER PERSON?

Damn, now you actually have to find a present for deaxs. Normally, you would take this time to examine your room to find something, but it is mostly just filled with LEGO. 

Although, now that you think about it, there is ONE thing you could give them...

You check under one of your LEGO piles for a collection of MOVIES. Let's see what we have here.

Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius? You can't give them that! It's far too valuable to just throw away like that.
Now, Gherbie Fully Goated on the other hand is perfect. This should definitely finish deaxs' Gherbie movie collection.
You take Gherbie Fully Goated and add it to your INVENTORY. It should look familiar, so it needs no explanation.

Well, you are deaxs now, so get used to it. It looks like they have made a good amount of progress since you started being Penny.

You suddenly become SOMEONE ENTIRELY DIFFERENT. Well, you WOULD become this person, but you have no reason to. At least not for now...

They seem to be watching a live feed of deaxs, and perhaps the other players too, but they aren't the only one watching.

It also looks like they are playing a really cool game? You should probably play it because it looks really cool.

Now, let's see what everyone else is up to.

You are now Riletta again. You just went outside to retrieve deaxs' gift after Isabel dropped it for some reason. You think that since deaxs is your neighbor, you can just go over to their house and give it to them.

What the fuck? You knew they went into the Threshold, but it took the ENTIRE HOUSE??? You were just expecting to chuck the gift through a portal or something. Nope! It looks like you'll have to wait until much later to give it to them.
After climbing back into your room, you decide to message Isabel and ask her a few questions.

33.value: You would start playing the game, but your room is a bit too cramped to start placing a bunch of stuff inside. If you go outside, you'll have more space to do things.

Welp. You guess the cat is out of the bag now. You live in NOWTHEN and you hate it here. You hate everything about it. You hate the farms, you hate your house, you hate the name, and most of all you hate the fucking horses. You hate the fucking horses. You would get rid of them, but they are your only companions because nobody else lives in this hellscape.

You watch as deaxs and Bitex go through the red portal and enter the Threshold. When they enter, your screen flashes with a bright white light. It takes a few seconds before you see them reappear in a brand new location.
You then see deaxs get their lights knocked the fucked out by a robotic, blue version of them.
And now Riletta is trying to message you for some reason.
